message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the application of network coding in wireless sensor networks, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the vulnerability of network coding to Byzantine attacks, which falls under the category of cryptography (cs.CR) and distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper proposes a distributed algorithm for detecting and isolating malicious nodes, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY).
